column5: Wondering if anyone has been trout fishing in the Nestor Falls area and how fishing has been?

Just came of a trout lake 20 mi north of vermilion bay today,good action,50 ft seemed to be the magic depth today,some whitefish moved in on ys a couple times also which was a bonus,lots of snow,knee depth,bring a shovel,i am sure lotw has the same conditions as here,had some slush but not like 2 weeks ago,you have a pool around your hole in no time and then the whole area will geet flooded fast,but who cares EH,
